mapper.update:
update euser_info
user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_pwd = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_manager = #{isManager,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mail_address = #{mailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update euser_info set user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_pwd = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_manager = #{isManager,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mail_address = #{mailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0)FROM euser_info AS e WHERE e.`user_code`=#{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND e.`user_pwd`=#{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
SELECT e.user_name FROM euser_info AS e WHERE e.user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM euser_info AS e WHERE e.`user_code`=#{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
SELECT e.uid FROM euser_info AS e WHERE e.`user_code`=#{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
